text: yadi koee aisa quraan hota, jisase parvat khisaka[1] diye jaate ya dharatee khand-khand kar dee jaatee ya isake dvaara murdon se baat kee jaatee (to bhee ve eemaan nahin laate). baat ye hai ki sab adhikaar allaah hee ko hain, to kya jo eemaan laaye hain, ve niraash nahin hue ki yadi allaah chaahata, to sab logon ko seedhee raah par kar deta! aur kaafiron ko unake karatoot ke kaaran baraabar aapada pahunchatee rahegee athava unake ghar ke sameep utaratee rehagee, yahaan tak ki allaah ka vachan[2] aa jaaye aur allaah, vachan ka virudhd nahin karata
